attributes.action: Stop sex discrimination in schools, making it unlawful for schools to refuse girls the right to wear trousers as part of their uniform.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Girls should have the right to wear smart  trousers as part of the schools' uniform- just as the boys do. There are so many perverts about and this will cover are daughters dignity whilst allowing them the freedom to play (as we parents know younger girls aren't always very lady like in the playground!). Trousers are also much warmer in the winter. Our children should be brought up in schools feeling equal to the boys, not experiencing sexism from the outset.
